question: Which Indian sprinter has won bronze in the men's event at the 2017 Asian 20 Km Race Walking Championships?
explanation: Irfan Kolothum Thodi from India has won the bronze in the 20 kilometre men\'s event in the Asian Race Walk Championships at Nomi in Japan. He is the national record holder in menâ€™s 20km race walk. Beside him, South Korea\'s Kim Hyun-Sub won gold while Georgiy Sheiko of Kazakhstan bagged the silver in the event. In the women\'s 20 kilometre event, India\'s Priyanka failed to climb the podium as she finished fourth.
